DYAD: UNITED KINGDOM - THAILAND
RIVALRY: RIV482
DISPUTE(S): MID1694 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20171217
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20171228


WWII MIDs: MID1694



RIVNOTES: 


NARRATIVE-CM:
Thailand declared war against Britain on January 25, 1942. Thailand voided its declaration of war against Britiain on August 16, 1945.

SOURCES-CM:
